fbfedfb15e614ed20810ddeab18f0552 (16:14): src/MainWindow.cpp:126: error: no matching function for call to ‚ÄòLessonDialog::LessonDialog(LessonSettings*&)

fbfedfb15e614ed20810ddeab18f0552 (16:18): LinuxadminA: multiple-inheritence is my approach. this way, uic generates the header, you write the cpp and you have much more control over the code.
021b7bf3ff2076c746a1ed6f90658a06 (16:19): rioch: nopaste the code again
7fd7651a8ca9108dbde4919c088cceff (16:20): qt4 do not use uic generates xxx.cpp . qt3 can do this
021b7bf3ff2076c746a1ed6f90658a06 (16:20): yes damit, read the manual
